TopicTitle: VAB/ SPH UI: sometimes the staging column overlaps the "back" button.

Articles.Content: Hi. Per the title, when I have a lot of stages on a craft, the staging icon column overlaps the "back" button. When I try to select that stage, the back button is enabled and I'm taken to a the space center menu page. It would be nice if the staging could not overlap the back button.
Yeah this would be nice, also don't forget to scroll stages with the mouse wheel or pageup/down
That's just it; sometimes I forget. What I'm suggesting is a UI "failsafe".
even if its just a prompt "you have an active ship in the hanger, do you really want to exit?"

even if its just a prompt "you have an active ship in the hanger, do you really want to exit?"

Hanger is that thing on which you hang your clothes.

And as far as I know your ship will still be in VAB or SPH if you immediately return. So it's an annoyance and it will be nice to have it fixed but it does not break things.
